hero.title: Create Your Perfect
hero.subtitle: Share your love story with a beautiful, personalized wedding website. Manage RSVPs, showcase photos, and create lasting memories with your guests.
features.title: Everything you need for your perfect day
features.subtitle: From guest management to photo sharing, we've got you covered.
features.customizationDesc: Personalize your site with our easy-to-use tools.
features.rsvpManagementDesc: Keep track of guest responses in real-time.
features.photoGalleriesDesc: Create beautiful galleries to share your memories.
features.multiLanguageDesc: Make your site accessible in multiple languages.
features.venueIntegrationDesc: Easily share venue details with your guests.
features.backgroundMusicDesc: Add a romantic touch with background music.
templates.title: Start with a beautiful template
templates.subtitle: Choose from our collection of professionally designed templates.
templates.gardenRomanceDesc: Perfect for an outdoor, nature-filled wedding.
templates.modernEleganceDesc: A sleek and chic design for a modern couple.
templates.rusticCharmDesc: A warm and cozy vibe for a countryside wedding.
templates.bohoChicDesc: For a free-spirited and artistic wedding.
pricing.title: Find the plan that's right for you
pricing.subtitle: Transparent pricing for every couple.

demo.storyText: We met on a rainy Tuesday at our favorite coffee shop. What started as a chance encounter became the most beautiful love story we could have imagined...
demo.howWeMetText: Every love story is special, and ours began in the most unexpected way...
